author: Jose Martinez
title: 2 Chainz, Gucci Mane, and Other Atlanta Rappers React to the Falcons‚Äô Epic Super Bowl LI Loss
text:
2 Chainz, Gucci Mane, and Other Atlanta Rappers React to the Falcons‚Äô Epic Super Bowl LI Loss By Jose Martinez Jose is a contributing writer for Complex Media. @ZayMarty
 Getty/Gregory Shamus The Atlanta Falcons were oh-so-close to becoming Super Bowl champions for the first time in franchise history. After a six-yard touchdown pass from Matt Ryan to Tevin Coleman gave the Falcons a seemingly comfortable 25-point in the third quarter, it looked like the Lombardi Trophy was coming to the ATL. Even Bow Wow was confidently calling it.
LMA BOW WOW IS A FUCKIN LOSER pic.twitter.com/euY8TkfhQD
‚Äî Kenny (@PhillyCustoms) February 6, 2017 But don't let all that bragging from distract you from the fact that the Falcons blew a 28-3 lead in the Super Bowl . Be prepared to hear that statement over the next couple of weeks...a lot.
Related Falcons Are Getting Roasted for Blowing a 28-3 Lead in the Super Bowl The 50 Biggest Fails in Super Bowl History Play Breakers: Immortal Super Bowl Moments After falling short against the Denver Broncos in Super Bowl XXXIII, the Falcons were looking to finally reach the mountaintop at Super Bowl LI with just the standing in their way. With the Falcons on the cusp of making history, many Atlanta rappers showed up to LRG Stadium in Houston, Texas to show their support.
#‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨ÜÔ∏è‚¨ÖÔ∏è‚û°Ô∏è‚ÜóÔ∏è‚ÜòÔ∏è‚ÜôÔ∏è‚ÜñÔ∏è‚ÜïÔ∏è‚§µÔ∏è‚§¥Ô∏è‚Ü©Ô∏è‚Ü™Ô∏è‚ÜîÔ∏è‚Ü™Ô∏è‚Ü©Ô∏è‚Ü©Ô∏è‚§¥Ô∏è‚§µÔ∏èüîÑüîÅüîÄTHATWAY pic.twitter.com/AoiomUcJvz
‚Äî T.I. (@Tip) February 6, 2017 Y'all forgive US. We don't know how to act. ain't never had SH*T!! BUT WE GON GET IT TODAY THO!! H !!! #RISEUP #ATLFALCONS #SUPERBOWLLI pic.twitter.com/SO2Grfv1Fg
‚Äî T.I. (@Tip) February 6, 2017 Found my trues on da sideline @Usher @2chainz #RISEUP #ATLFALCONS #SUPERBOWLLI pic.twitter.com/PsozWAnwDi
‚Äî T.I. (@Tip) February 6, 2017 As the Falcons were collapsing, their fans were starting to feel stressed out. Just look at Bow Wow.
Fucking mad #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/jG41nFyhnV
‚Äî Shad Moss(Bow Wow) (@smoss) February 6, 2017 When the final whistle was blown, the sadness and disappointment officially kicked in.
Still can't be mad Fareal #RISEUP pic.twitter.com/sgLmq4c2HH
‚Äî T.I. (@Tip) February 6, 2017 Great game @atlantafalcons me and my atown Patna @usher was there for the best game ever , hopefully next year
A photo posted by 2 Chainz Aka Tity Boi (@hairweavekiller) on Feb 5, 2017 at 8:16pm PST
Even Peter and Paul couldn't win em all!
‚Äî Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) February 6, 2017 Hey, there's always next year.
